page.title: 13LIFE STYLES:A COMMUTER
page.content: At{7.00am}gets up,showers and shaves before a breakfast of toast and coffee.He leaves home at{8.00}in the car provided by the Company he works for.He travels into{Glasgow}along the busy Clarkston Road with frequent delays at traffic lights.After the half hour journey he searches for a parking space near his office.He works for a large insurance company.It is a busy day mainly behind the desk but he may have to call on clients.He works an{eight hour day}which includes one and a half hours for lunch.At{5.00}he joins the heavy traffic leaving Glasgow by the Kingston Bridge Motorway.After a family evening meal he relaxes by watching television. In summer he plays golf at a local course.His other interests are wine and beer making and he enjoys gardening at weekends.
